Description:
IN (1) - You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely mild- steel welding fume, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.
IN (2) - You have failed to make and give effect to suitable arrangements that are appropriate for the effective monitoring and maintenance of your water-mix metal working fluids.
IN (3) - You have failed to ensure that a suitable and sufficient assessment as to whether asbestos is or is liable to be present has been carried out at the above premises.
